metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10768 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low.
metadata.Description:
In AngularJS before 1.7.9 the function `merge()` could be tricked into adding or modifying properties of `Object.prototype` using a `__proto__` payload.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10768` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-angularjs - 1.7.9-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: angular.js package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7.9-1').
